messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] nerve
messages.msgSnippet: Last post because we seem to be talking at cross purposes here.  What you said about your father wasn t inappropriate, nor did it hit a nerve.  What was
messages.messageBody:
Last post because we seem to be talking at cross purposes here. What you
said about your father wasn't inappropriate, nor did it "hit a nerve." What
was irritating was being told to be "careful" when I had purposely used
phrasing which clearly stated that I wasn't including all doctors just so no
one would feel they needed to make such remarks.

Lynda
----- Original Message -----
From: "elana weisberg" <azpioneers@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, January 25, 2002 7:26 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] nerve


> Wow,
> I seemed to have touch a nerve. I mentioned my father because I felt it
was
> appropriate to the discussion, sorry if you felt it was inappropriate. In
> addition I enjoy reading all the posts for they offer a different slant on
> htings, life in general, that is the reason I am here. I can't recall, but
> wasn't there a recent post from Arizona? Where are you?
> Elana Weisberg
> hs:ashley 13, jason (RAD) 11, Chloe 10, Gavrielle 3 1/2

messages.subject: nerve
messages.msgSnippet: Wow, I seemed to have touch a nerve. I mentioned my father because I felt it was appropriate to the discussion, sorry if you felt it was inappropriate. In
messages.messageBody:
Wow,
I seemed to have touch a nerve. I mentioned my father because I felt it was
appropriate to the discussion, sorry if you felt it was inappropriate. In
addition I enjoy reading all the posts for they offer a different slant on
htings, life in general, that is the reason I am here. I can't recall, but
wasn't there a recent post from Arizona? Where are you?
Elana Weisberg
hs:ashley 13, jason (RAD) 11, Chloe 10, Gavrielle 3 1/2
